mapper.select: SELECT taskno "taskno",zcf "zcf",tshf "tshf",zxf "zxf",tcf "tcf",gsf "gsf",qtfy "qtfy",totalprice "totalprice",fk "fk",psf "psf",ycf "ycf",pz_volume "pz_volume", (SELECT srt.shp_name from SHIPPER_TAB srt WHERE srt.SHP_CODE=tt.shp_code) "shp_name" FROM TASKFEE_TAB_TEMP tt where LRR=#{lrr}
